name: Jane Wyman
spouse: Ernest Eugene Wyman (m.1933), Myron Futterman (1937-1938), Ronald Reagan (1940-1948), Fred Karger (1952-1954), Fred Karger (1961-1965)
goldenglobeawards: '''Best Actress - Motion Picture Drama''', 1949 ''Johnny Belinda'', 1952 ''The Blue Veil'' ,  '''Best Actress - Drama Series''', 1983 ''Falcon Crest''
